name: Snork's Bubble Trouble
description:
Help Snork get his girlfriend, Sally back from the Terrible Ray!

Fight off waves of enemies with your powerful bubble blaster and win back your girl. You'll be fighting off angry fish, hermit crabs, and spiky sea urchins! To also make this game a bit more fun, there is also a Fun Facts section so the player can learn more about the sea creatures in this game.

Check out the RedBubble store here: https://www.redbubble.com/people/CoralStarTaylor/shop?asc=u
